CustomField.description: Used for Conga - auto populates text on document when checked
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box to include net 90 payment terms in the "payment terms" section of the quote document. THIS IS ONLY FOR DIRECT MONTHLY - EOQ PROMO. This will give the customer net 90 terms for every monthly invoice (not just the first payment).
CustomField.label: Net 90 Payment Terms Language
